oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthetic Studies toward Actinorhodin and gamma-Actinorhodin by using a Homo-coupling Strategy: Synthesis of Hemiactinorhodin and Hemi-gamma-actinorhodin
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MULAY, SV
BHOWMIK, A
FERNANDES, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: KONSTITUTION DES ACTINORHODINS
DOUBLE FUROFURAN ANNULATION
CRISAMICIN-A
PYRANONAPHTHOQUINONE ANTIBIOTICS
DIMERIC PYRANONAPHTHOQUINONES
UBER ACTINOMYCETENFARBSTOFFE
ASYMMETRIC DIHYDROXYLATION
ENANTIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
(+)-VENTILOQUINONE L
BIOLOGICAL-ACTIVITY
Synthetic methods
Annulation
Oxygen heterocycles
Antibiotics
Actinorhodins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A homo-coupling strategy toward the synthesis of actinorhodin and gamma-actinorhodin has been explored. The monomeric unit was synthesized by employing an efficient combination of Dotz benzannulation and oxa-Pictet-Spengler reactions. Attempts towards oxidative homo-coupling of the pyranonaphthalene monomer intermediate to give dimer were unsuccessful. Later, monomer pyranonaphthalene was carried forward to complete the synthesis of hemiactinorhodin and hemi-gamma-actinorhodin.
